title: The Wake Reckoning — Drawing the Lines
narration: Beyond the shattered Crucible lies the Wake Reckoning: a colossal amphitheater of grav staircases spiral
ing around a void of mirrored water. Every reflection shows a different resolution of Act Five. Some gleam with victory parad
es, some whisper with hidden caravans, some hold cities that survived with scars, and some shimmer with memorial gardens. A ma
ssive ledger-constellation hovers overhead, ticking down the moments before the final confrontation. Gremlins wire the stairs
with phase gates, traders float credit orbs you can cash in for last-minute miracles, whales fold the void so any squad can
surface instantly, hackers weave counter-scripts against the Reckoning intelligence, validators align oath pylons around the
rim, miners anchor resonance pylons, and the meme division throws up sigils reading "WE GO ALL-IN, WE GO ALL-TOGETHER" in an

y language you ever loved.

Seven beats prepare the Reckoning. The first anchors the amphitheater and decodes the adversary
clock. The second phases your quartet plan across reflected timelines. The third consecrates memory vaults and cloak flux cha
nnels. The fourth assigns phalanx, shadow, lifeline, and herald crews to the staircases. The fifth rehearses simultaneous tria
ls and resolves. The sixth convenes the Reckoning Verdict. The seventh opens the mirrored descent toward Act Five’s deciding mo

rounds.description: Reckoning Anchor — steady the amphitheater and decipher the enemy countdown.

crit_success.narration: You lock the grav staircases in synchronized orbit. The void settles like a waiting dr
um.

success.narration: The amphitheater steadies and the reflections align.

fail.narration: A staircase wobbles. You fund whale-guided braces to lock it down.

crit_fail.narration: You tumble three tiers before the AFK mesh yanks you upright.

banter.miner: We bolted every tread with star rivets.

crit_success.narration: You read the ledger-constellation like sheet music. You now know exactly when the reck
oning intelligence plans to strike.

success.narration: The countdown resolves into a clear rhythm on your HUD.

fail.narration: Glare off the mirrored void throws your readings; you buy polarized visors.

crit_fail.narration: A counter-pulse spikes your vision. Teammates steady you while the clock snaps into foc

banter.miner: We carved the timing into the steps.

rounds.description: Phase Weave — align the quartet plan across mirrored timelines and reinforce supply wards.

crit_success.narration: Loss, hide, live, and win shimmer through every reflection. The Reckoning recognizes y
ou in all futures at once.

success.narration: The mirrored lanes echo your plan with crisp precision.

fail.narration: One reflection desyncs; you bribe the Reckoning with a vow and resync it.

crit_fail.narration: The mirrors shatter and reassemble around you. You keep weaving through the vertigo.

banter.shiller: We are everywhere at once, babe.
banter.miner: We studded the mirrors with ore anchors.

crit_success.narration: You ring the amphitheater with shielded caches. Whoever falls back will find reliquarie
s, cloaks, rations, and banners waiting.

success.narration: Status icons flash green around the arena.

fail.narration: A cache falls into the void; traders bill you for retrieval.

crit_fail.narration: A ward detonates in your hands. You shake off the sparks and rebuild it.

banter.shiller: Snack rings plus banner vaults? Luxury.
banter.miner: We riveted each cache into bedrock.
banter.meme: Ring of power, but it's snacks and hope.

rounds.description: Memory Flux — bless the vaults and tune cloak pathways across the void.

crit_success.narration: You seal vows, names, and unfinished toasts into the vault. The Reckoning promises none
of them will be erased.

success.narration: The vault doors glow with every story you honor.

fail.narration: A ledger squeals. You buy a new stylus and keep writing.

crit_fail.narration: Memories flood you until you sob; friends steady you and add their own stories.

banter.miner: We lined the vault with luminous ore.

crit_success.narration: Veil currents flow across the void like aurora. Anyone under your guard can vanish betw
een reflections at will.

success.narration: The cloak pathways glow faint and obedient.

fail.narration: A veil flickers. You pay hackers to retune the flux channels.

crit_fail.narration: You vanish mid-sentence and reappear upside down. The squad applauds your acrobatics.

banter.miner: We threaded the flux through crystal veins.

rounds.description: Phalanx Designation — assign crews to stairwells and link them with mirrored comm bridges.

crit_success.narration: Phalanx, shadowline, lifeline, and herald squads claim stairwells with chants that shak
e the amphitheater.

success.narration: Assignments lock; mirrored insignias bloom over every squad.

fail.narration: Two crews fight over theme music. You sponsor a mashup remix to settle it.

crit_fail.narration: You get hoisted in celebration and accidentally dropped into a fountain.

banter.miner: We carved insignias into the steps.
banter.meme: Roll call? More like rock concert.

crit_success.narration: Your comm grid folds through every reflection, letting squads call across realities with
out delay.

success.narration: Mirrored signals lock into crisp harmony.

fail.narration: Echoes screech; you underwrite extra dampeners.

crit_fail.narration: The bridge zaps you through twelve reflections before it stabilizes.

banter.shiller: We built a hotline to every possible us.
banter.miner: We strung the relays through mirrored ore.
banter.meme: Group chat includes alternate timelines now.

rounds.description: Trial Rehearsal — simulate multi-ending clashes and prime the resolve chant.

crit_success.narration: You stage simultaneous duels, rescues, stealth strikes, and celebrations until every sq
uad moves like a choir.

success.narration: The simulations run hot and end with applause.

fail.narration: A mis-timed swap collapses half the staging. You rebuild with upgraded props.

crit_fail.narration: The simulation hits you with a surprise sacrifice scenario. You stagger but stay standi

banter.dev: Trial sim flagged as heroic canon.
banter.trader: Outcome spreads trending in your favor.

crit_success.narration: Your chant threads through every mirrored future. Even timelines you never visited ans
wer with echoes.

success.narration: The amphitheater vibrates with collective resolve.

fail.narration: Your voice cracks; you hand out throat lozenges and start over.

crit_fail.narration: Emotion floors you mid-verse. The crowd finishes it with tears and laughter.

banter.miner: We carved lyrics into the rail.

rounds.description: Reckoning Verdict — call the council, commit the plan, and archive the chant for posterity.

crit_success.narration: Delegates from every mirror stand on the central dais. The void mirrors them into infin
ity.

fail.narration: Logistics hiccup. You underwrite extra teleport gates to bring everyone in.

crit_fail.narration: Your heart stutters from adrenaline; medics steady you while the council waits.

banter.miner: We carved seats from mirrored stone.
banter.meme: Council? More like multiversal hype squad.

crit_success.narration: Hands rise across the amphitheater and within every reflection. The Reckoning accepts yo
ur plan.

success.narration: Consensus ripples through the void in concentric light.

fail.narration: A stalemate forms. You bribe destiny with another round of miracle credits.

crit_fail.narration: Debate spikes; you take the backlash and promise a calmer re-call.

banter.miner: We rang the stair bells in chorus.

success.narration: You bind the chant, drills, and promises into a mirrored hymnal that future crews can u

banter.miner: We etched staves into mirrored stone.

rounds.description: Mirrored Descent — open the way toward Act Five’s decisive confrontation.

success.narration: Mirrors fold into a single stair of light. Every squad marches beside its reflection to

banter.miner: We polished the stair with comet dust.
banter.meme: Time to meet destiny face to face.
